blocks.name: idfusubc0
blocks.content: The identity functor for a subcategory is an "inclusion functor" from the subcategory into its supercategory. (Contributed by AV, 29-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm idfusubc0(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wceq(c2, cop(cres(cid, c3), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cres(cid, co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, c4), cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c1, cresc, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cidfu, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wceq(c2, cop(cres(cid, c3), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cres(cid, co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, c4), cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wceq(c2, cop(cres(cid, c3), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cres(cid, co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, c4), cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wceq(c2, cop(cres(cid, c3), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cres(cid, co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, c4), cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wceq(c2, cop(cres(cid, c3), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cres(cid, co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, c4), cv(s1))))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  eqtrd(c2, cop(cres(cid, c3), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cres(cid, co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, c4), cv(s1))))), cop(cres(cid, c3), cmpt(hs0, cxp(c3, c3), cres(cid, cfv(cfv(chom, c4), cv(hs0))))), wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  idfuval(hs0, c2, c3, cfv(chom, c4), c4, wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  subccat(c4, c1, c0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  id(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  eqid(cfv(chom, c4))
  opeq2d(cres(cid, c3), cmpt(hs0, cxp(c3, c3), cres(cid, cfv(cfv(chom, c4), cv(hs0)))), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cres(cid, co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, c4), cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wceq(cmpt(hs0, cxp(c3, c3), cres(cid, cfv(cfv(chom, c4), cv(hs0)))), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cres(cid, co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, c4), cv(s1))))))
  mpt2mpt(hs0, s0, s1, c3, c3, cres(cid, cfv(cfv(chom, c4), cv(hs0))), cres(cid, co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, c4), cv(s1))))
  reseq2d(cid, cfv(cfv(chom, c4), cv(hs0)), co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, c4), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cfv(chom, c4), cv(hs0)), co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, c4), cv(s1)), cfv(cfv(chom, c4), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cfv(chom, c4))
  df-ov(cv(s0), cfv(chom, c4), cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(chom, c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cres(cid, co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, c4), cv(s1))))
  diff.cres.s(s0, cid, cfv(cfv(chom, c4), cv(hs0)))
  diff.cid.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cfv(chom, c4), cv(hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, chom, c4)
  diff.chom.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cres.s(s1, cid, cfv(cfv(chom, c4), cv(hs0)))
  diff.cid.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cfv(chom, c4), cv(hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, chom, c4)
  diff.chom.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm idfusubc0(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1)→ c2 = <(= |` c3),(s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c3 ↦(= |`(s0[(Hom ` c4)]s1)))>)
  ⊣ c4 =(c1[|`cat]c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(idFunc ` c4)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1)→ c2 = <(= |` c3),(s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c3 ↦(= |`(s0[(Hom ` c4)]s1)))>), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii((c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1)→ c2 = <(= |` c3),(s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c3 ↦(= |`(s0[(Hom ` c4)]s1)))>), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii((c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1)→ c2 = <(= |` c3),(s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c3 ↦(= |`(s0[(Hom ` c4)]s1)))>), d(s1, c0))
  a1ii((c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1)→ c2 = <(= |` c3),(s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c3 ↦(= |`(s0[(Hom ` c4)]s1)))>), d(s1, c1))
  eqtrd(c2, <(= |` c3),(s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c3 ↦(= |`(s0[(Hom ` c4)]s1)))>, <(= |` c3),(hs0 ∈(c3 × c3)↦(= |`((Hom ` c4)` hs0)))>, c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1))
  idfuval(hs0, c2, c3, (Hom ` c4), c4, c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1))
  subccat(c4, c1, c0, c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1))
  id(c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1))
  eqid((Hom ` c4))
  opeq2d((= |` c3), (hs0 ∈(c3 × c3)↦(= |`((Hom ` c4)` hs0))), (s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c3 ↦(= |`(s0[(Hom ` c4)]s1))), c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1))
  a1i(c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1), (hs0 ∈(c3 × c3)↦(= |`((Hom ` c4)` hs0)))=(s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c3 ↦(= |`(s0[(Hom ` c4)]s1))))
  mpt2mpt(hs0, s0, s1, c3, c3, (= |`((Hom ` c4)` hs0)), (= |`(s0[(Hom ` c4)]s1)))
  reseq2d(cid, ((Hom ` c4)` hs0), (s0[(Hom ` c4)]s1), hs0 = < s0, s1 >)
  syl6eqr(((Hom ` c4)` hs0), (s0[(Hom ` c4)]s1), ((Hom ` c4)` < s0, s1 >), hs0 = < s0, s1 >)
  fveq2(hs0, < s0, s1 >, (Hom ` c4))
  df-ov(s0, (Hom ` c4), s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c((Hom ` c4))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c((= |`(s0[(Hom ` c4)]s1)))
  diff.cres.s(s0, cid, ((Hom ` c4)` hs0))
  diff.cid.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, (Hom ` c4), hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, chom, c4)
  diff.chom.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cres.s(s1, cid, ((Hom ` c4)` hs0))
  diff.cid.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, (Hom ` c4), hs0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, chom, c4)
  diff.chom.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: idfusubc
blocks.content: The identity functor for a subcategory is an "inclusion functor" from the subcategory into its supercategory. (Contributed by AV, 29-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm idfusubc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)), wceq(c2, cop(cres(cid, c3), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cres(cid, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c1, cresc, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cidfu, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
} = {
  eqtrd(c2, cop(cres(cid, c3), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cres(cid, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))), cop(cres(cid, c3), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cres(cid, co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, c4), cv(s1))))), wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  idfusubc0(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  opeq2d(cres(cid, c3), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cres(cid, co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, c4), cv(s1)))), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c3, cres(cid, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  mpt2eq3dv(s0, s1, c3, c3, cres(cid, co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, c4), cv(s1))), cres(cid, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))), wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  reseq2d(cid, co(cv(s0), cfv(chom, c4), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  oveqd(cv(s0), cfv(chom, c4), cv(s1), c0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  eqcomd(cfv(chom, c4), c0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  reschom(c0, c4, c1, cfv(cbs, c1), ccat, cdm(cdm(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  subcrcl(c0, c1)
  subcss1(cdm(cdm(c0)), cfv(cbs, c1), c0, c1, wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  subcfn(c0, cdm(cdm(c0)), c1, wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  id(wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  eqidd(cdm(cdm(c0)), wcel(c0, cfv(csubc, c1)))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(csubc, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, csubc, c1)
  diff.csubc.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cfv(csubc, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, csubc, c1)
  diff.csubc.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm idfusubc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1)→ c2 = <(= |` c3),(s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c3 ↦(= |`(s0[c0]s1)))>)
  ⊣ c4 =(c1[|`cat]c0)
  ⊣ c2 =(idFunc ` c4)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  eqtrd(c2, <(= |` c3),(s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c3 ↦(= |`(s0[c0]s1)))>, <(= |` c3),(s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c3 ↦(= |`(s0[(Hom ` c4)]s1)))>, c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1))
  idfusubc0(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  opeq2d((= |` c3), (s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c3 ↦(= |`(s0[(Hom ` c4)]s1))), (s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c3 ↦(= |`(s0[c0]s1))), c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1))
  mpt2eq3dv(s0, s1, c3, c3, (= |`(s0[(Hom ` c4)]s1)), (= |`(s0[c0]s1)), c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1))
  reseq2d(cid, (s0[(Hom ` c4)]s1), (s0[c0]s1), c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1))
  oveqd(s0, (Hom ` c4), s1, c0, c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1))
  eqcomd((Hom ` c4), c0, c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1))
  reschom(c0, c4, c1, (Base ` c1), ccat, dom(dom(c0)), c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1))
  subcrcl(c0, c1)
  subcss1(dom(dom(c0)), (Base ` c1), c0, c1, c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1))
  subcfn(c0, dom(dom(c0)), c1, c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1))
  id(c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1))
  eqidd(dom(dom(c0)), c0 ∈(Subcat ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, (Subcat ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, csubc, c1)
  diff.csubc.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, (Subcat ` c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, csubc, c1)
  diff.csubc.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: inclfusubc
blocks.content: The "inclusion functor" from a subcategory of a category into the category itself. (Contributed by AV, 30-Mar-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm inclfusubc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, co(c1, cfunc, c2), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(csubc, c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c2, cresc, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, cres(cid, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cmpo(s0, s1, c5, c5, cres(cid, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(c0, co(c1, cfunc, c2), c3), wcel(cfv(cidfu, c1), co(c1, cfunc, c2)))
  sseldi(cfv(cidfu, c1), co(c1, cfunc, c2), co(c1, cfth, c2), w0)
  fthfunc(c1, c2)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cidfu, c1), co(c1, cfth, c2)), wcel(c4, cfv(csubc, c2)))
  rescfth(c4, c2, cfv(cidfu, c1), c1)
  syl5bb(w0, wbr(c0, co(c1, cfunc, c2), c3), wcel(cfv(cidfu, c1), co(c1, cfunc, c2)), wcel(cop(c0, c3), co(c1, cfunc, c2)))
  df-br(c0, co(c1, cfunc, c2), c3)
  eleq1d(cop(c0, c3), co(c1, cfunc, c2), cfv(cidfu, c1), w0)
  eqtr4d(cop(c0, c3), cfv(cidfu, c1), cop(cres(cid, c5), cmpo(s0, s1, c5, c5, cres(cid, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))), w0)
  opeq12d(c0, c3, cres(cid, c5), cmpo(s0, s1, c5, c5, cres(cid, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cidfu, c1), cop(cres(cid, c5), cmpo(s0, s1, c5, c5, cres(cid, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))))), wcel(c4, cfv(csubc, c2)))
  idfusubc(s0, s1, c4, c2, cfv(cidfu, c1), c5, c1)
  eqid(cfv(cidfu, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm inclfusubc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[(c1[Func]c2)]c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈(Subcat ` c2))
  ⊣ c1 =(c2[|`cat]c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 =(= |` c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 =(s0 ∈ c5, s1 ∈ c5 ↦(= |`(s0[c4]s1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, c0[(c1[Func]c2)]c3, (idFunc ` c1)∈(c1[Func]c2))
  sseldi((idFunc ` c1), (c1[Func]c2), (c1[Faith]c2), w0)
  fthfunc(c1, c2)
  syl(w0, (idFunc ` c1)∈(c1[Faith]c2), c4 ∈(Subcat ` c2))
  rescfth(c4, c2, (idFunc ` c1), c1)
  syl5bb(w0, c0[(c1[Func]c2)]c3, (idFunc ` c1)∈(c1[Func]c2), < c0, c3 > ∈(c1[Func]c2))
  df-br(c0, (c1[Func]c2), c3)
  eleq1d(< c0, c3 >, (c1[Func]c2), (idFunc ` c1), w0)
  eqtr4d(< c0, c3 >, (idFunc ` c1), <(= |` c5),(s0 ∈ c5, s1 ∈ c5 ↦(= |`(s0[c4]s1)))>, w0)
  opeq12d(c0, c3, (= |` c5), (s0 ∈ c5, s1 ∈ c5 ↦(= |`(s0[c4]s1))), w0)
  syl(w0, (idFunc ` c1)= <(= |` c5),(s0 ∈ c5, s1 ∈ c5 ↦(= |`(s0[c4]s1)))>, c4 ∈(Subcat ` c2))
  idfusubc(s0, s1, c4, c2, (idFunc ` c1), c5, c1)
  eqid((idFunc ` c1))
}
